melhor jogo 2

The game may not be as good as the original portal but still it is a great sequel. If the original Portal was a 10/10 game then this would be a 9.5/10. The game improves on the original by introducing new mechanics, larger levels and a CO-OP mode (which i was sadly unable to play). Personally i felt the story of the original game was better because it had the perfect balance between gameplay and storytelling whereas Portal 2 sometimes feels like a slog.

Nevertheless The game has moments that can genuinely make you laugh and gives insight to GLaDOS and Aperature character. For those who want lore the game has hidden lores and references throught the game. Bought for a very cheap price. Worth every penny!!!

There's only a handful of games that allow this guilty little pleasure, where you go read the negative reviews just because you can't understand how it's possible not to like the game. Go on, you won't be dissapointed. Anyway if you never played this game yet, well, you kinda have to. For science.

Portal 2 ist ein Meisterwerk und ein sehr gelungener Nachfolger von Portal (1). Sie Story ist lustig und spannend. Die Puzzle und der Multiplayer garantieren ein Spiel, welches man jederzeit nochmal spielen kann.

Absolute classic. Solo or Co-op is a lot of fun and very challenging...if you don't look up tutorials on youtube you scrubs. Co-op had me and my brother in tears laughing at our stupidity. Very fun and challenging for our tiny short attention spand minds.

Jogo muito bom, a jogabilidade Ã© muito boa no teclado e no controle, os grÃ¡ficos sÃ£o muito bons, considerando a Ã©poca que o jogo foi lanÃ§ado, os grÃ¡ficos parecem de um jogo de 2015, ou seja, muito avanÃ§ado pra Ã©poca, e isso Ã© um elemento muito bom pro jogo, o modo histÃ³ria Ã© maravilhoso, a histÃ³ria Ã© divertida e muito bem humorada, vai te arrancar boas risadas, na minha opiniÃ£o supera a histÃ³ria de muitos jogos atuais, e o multiplayer Ã© excelente, os puzzles sÃ£o muito legais e divertidos, vocÃª pode passar um bom tempo pensando em como passar de uma fase, e isso acaba se tornando muito divertido jogando com um amigo no coop, vale cada centavo na minha opiniÃ£o. O melhor jogo que jÃ¡ joguei (podem achar que estou exagerando, mas nÃ£o to nÃ£o). A minha nota pra esse jogo Ã© com certeza um 10/10.

Pros:
-The dialouge is much funnier than Portal 1. 
-The comments are amusing to listen to while solving puzzles. 
-The story makes you feel hatred for characters.

Cons: 
-The game becmae unbearable for me. In Portal 1 I couldn't stop playing. In Portal 2 I had to DRAG myself back to finish the game.
-Chapter 6 has immense open spaces and introduces new components to the game I feel lessened my value of the game. 
-I became mechanically comfortable enough with the game that I was coming up with alternative ways to complete levels using momentums only to encounter force fields. I do not beleive I hould be punished for finding a different path to finishing your game.

Conclusion: In the end, if it weren't for the good writing for the characters and messages, I wouldn't have finished this game. If you want to waste a couple hours for 2 bucks, this game is it for you.

Definetly recommend this game. Some of the things that this game has that portal 1 didn't had :
1) Game characters had impressionable personalities
2) More game mechanics than portal 1
3) Some kind of story (Portal 1 feels like just solving puzzles)
3) Awsome ending

Finally played it after all these years this years and loved it! Both gameplay and graphics hold up very well, the story is really entertaining, the controls are great and there are no bugs; definitely recommend it, especially for the incredibly low price of just a couple bucks! Plus, it's got Stephen Merchant voice acting, so that's an automatic win in my book ;)
